text: wamin alnaas fariq muwmin yaqul fi deayh: rabana atina fi aldunya eafyt wrzqana welmana nafeana, wemla salhana, waghayr dhlk min 'umur aldiyn waldnya, wafi alakhirat aljnt, wasrf enna eadhab alnar. whdha alduea' min 'ajmae aladeyt, wlhdha kan 'akthar duea' alnabiu salaa allah ealayh wslm, kama thabat fi alshyhyn
